comment: * Utility to create an instance of {@link ApfProgramEvent}.

methods.name: public Builder setLifetime(long lifetime)
methods.comment: * Set the maximum computed lifetime of the program in seconds.

methods.name: public Builder setActualLifetime(long lifetime)
methods.comment: * Set the effective program lifetime in seconds.

methods.name: public Builder setFilteredRas(int filteredRas)
methods.comment: * Set the number of RAs filtered by the APF program.

methods.name: public Builder setCurrentRas(int currentRas)
methods.comment: * Set the total number of current RAs at generation time.

methods.name: public Builder setProgramLength(int programLength)
methods.comment: * Set the length of the APF program in bytes.

methods.name: public Builder setFlags(boolean hasIPv4, boolean multicastFilterOn)
methods.comment: * Set the flags describing what an Apf program filters.
